title: Cops find body of a young male shot dead in Kosgoda
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The body of a man suspected to have been shot dead was found in a judgle areas in Kosgoda today (22).
Sri Lanka Police suspect the murder may have taken place on Thursday (21) night.
The deceased was identified as a 28 year old resident of Pathegama, Balapitiya.
#PriceHike : 12.5 kg gas cylinder price increased to Rs. 5,175/-
